Label.en: But the efforts of Victor Hugo, and his novel in 1831, the Hunchback of Notre Dame, changed public opinion!
Label.fr: Mais le playdoyer de Victor Hugo, et son roman 'Notre-Dame de Paris', influencèrent l'opinion publique !
Label.es: But the efforts of Victor Hugo, and his novel in 1831, the Hunchback of Notre Dame, changed public opinion!
Label.zh: But the efforts of Victor Hugo, and his novel in 1831, the Hunchback of Notre Dame, changed public opinion!

Label.en: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..
Label.fr: Le gouvernement lança une souscription et fit restaurer le bâtiment, alors complètement délabré. Les fameuses 'chimères' (à ne pas cofondre avec les gargouilles) furent ajoutées par Viollet-le-Duc
Label.es: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..
Label.zh: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..

Label.en: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!
Label.fr: La flèche, qui menaçait de s'effondrer fut entièrement reconstruite, et il n'y eu pas de nouveaux incidents jusqu'en 2019
Label.es: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!
Label.zh: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!

Label.en: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and 'forest'!
Label.fr: En avril 2019 la toiture pris feu à l'occasion de travaux d'entretien... et la fameuse flèche fut détruite ainsi que la 'forêt'!
Label.es: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and 'forest'!
Label.zh: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and 'forest'!

Label.en: Luckily, the main structures are still intact
Label.fr: Heureusement les structures principales ont tenu le coup
